name.pehl.piriti.client.xml
Interface XPath

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractXPathImpl, GwtXPathImpl
public interface XPath

Interface for parsing xpath expressions and returning relevant information.

Version:
$Date: 2010-06-10 18:37:18 +0200 (Do, 10. Jun 2010) $ $Revision: 527 $
Author:
$Author: harald.pehl $

Method Detail

getElements

List<Element> getElements(Document document)
Returns all elements which are direct children of the documents root element.

Parameters:
document -
Returns:
all elements which are direct children of the documents root element or null if the document is null or if the documents root element is empty.

getElements

List<Element> getElements(Element element)
Returns all elements which are direct children of the specified element.

Parameters:
element -
Returns:
all elements which are direct children of the specified element or null if the element is null or empty.

getElements

List<Element> getElements(Document document,
                          String xpath)
Returns a list of elements for the specifed xpath.

Parameters:
document -
xpath -
Returns:
The list of elements matching the xpath or an empty list if no matching elements were found

getValues

String[] getValues(Document document,
                   String xpath)
Returns the string values for the specified xpath. The nodes selected by the xpath expression must be attribute or a text nodes.

Parameters:
document -
xpath -
Returns:
The string values matched by the xpath or null if the xpath does not resolve to attribute or text nodes

getValues

String[] getValues(Element element,
                   String xpath)
Returns the string values for the specified xpath. The nodes selected by the xpath expression must be attribute or a text nodes.

Parameters:
document -
xpath -
Returns:
The string values matched by the xpath or null if the xpath does not resolve to attribute or text nodes

getValue

String getValue(Document document,
                String xpath)
Returns the string value for the specified xpath. The node selected by the xpath expression must be an attribute or a text node.

Parameters:
document -
xpath -
Returns:
The string value matched by the xpath or null if the xpath does not resolve to an attribute or text node

getValue

String getValue(Element element,
                String xpath)
Returns the string value for the specified xpath. The node selected by the xpath expression must be an attribute or a text node.

Parameters:
element -
xpath -
Returns:
The string value matched by the xpath or null if the xpath does not resolve to an attribute or text node
